name: Garden Hose Nozzle, Heavy Duty Metal Water Hose Nozzle with 8 Adjustable Spray Patterns, High Pressure Hand Sprayer with Flow Control for for Garden Watering, Car & Pet Washing
short_description: **Durable Metal Garden Hose Nozzle** Crafted from 100% metal materials, this garden hose nozzle is built to last. Its rust-proof, corrosion-resistant, and wear-resistant design ensures long-lasting durability, outperforming plastic nozzles. The shock-resistant rubber bezel adds extra protection against accidental drops and damage.

**Upgraded Water Flow Control** Our newly upgraded garden hose nozzle features a thumb-controlled water flow valve. Simply slide the valve left or right to easily adjust the water pressure from a gentle mist to a powerful stream. The integrated design and internal rubber O-rings ensure a leak-free, tight seal for hassle-free use.

**8 Adjustable Spray Patterns** This versatile garden hose spray nozzle offers 8 customizable spray modes, including center, shower, mist, flat, full, jet, cone, and more. Rotate the dial to select the perfect pattern for watering plants, cleaning patios, washing cars, or any outdoor task.

**Ergonomic and Comfortable Design** Designed for ease of use, our garden hose nozzle features a comfortable ergonomic grip and a convenient thumb lock to reduce hand fatigue during prolonged use. The rubberized handle stays cool to the touch, making it ideal for extended gardening or cleaning sessions.

**Universal Fit for All Standard Garden Hoses** Compatible with all 3/4-inch GHT (Garden Hose Thread) standard hoses in the U.S., this garden hose nozzle requires no adapters. Perfect for pet washing, lawn care, plant watering, window cleaning, car washing, and more, it’s a must-have tool for every outdoor task!

name: Dramm Revolver Heavy Duty 9 Pattern Quick Click Adjustable Garden Hose Spray Nozzle with Trigger Style Handle, for your Car, Boat, Deck, Sidewalk, Flowers and Young Trees, Orange
short_description: Versatile 9 Spray Patterns – Easily switch between mist, shower, jet, soaker, and more to meet all your watering and cleaning needs.
Heavy-Duty Metal Construction – Built with high-quality materials to ensure long-lasting durability and resistance to wear and tear.
Ergonomic Design for Comfort – The soft, contoured handle reduces hand fatigue, allowing for extended use without discomfort.
Easy Thumb-Controlled Water Flow – Adjust water pressure effortlessly with a simple thumb lever for convenience and ease of use.
Universal Fit for Standard Garden Hoses – Designed with a secure, leak-free connection that fits all standard U.S. garden hoses.
Nine spray patterns for any outdoor activity involving water (washing cars, bathing dogs, watering plants)
Quick change patterns
Ergonomic insulated grip
Heavy-duty construction
Lifetime guarantee and available in six enticing colors: red, orange, yellow, green, blue, and berry
product_description: Dramm Revolver 9-Pattern Spray Gun Orange Wash your car, boat, dog or horse; clean your deck and sidewalk; water your flowers and young trees. The 9-Pattern Revolver aids in any outdoor function involving water. The 9 patterns include: Fan, cone, center, jet, mist, soaker, flat, angle, and shower. The Lightweight Revolver has an ergonomic insulated grip. The Revolver is constructed with heavy-duty metal. orange, yellow, green, blue, and berry.

name: Hose Nozzle [Blue] Heavy Duty Hose Sprayer With 10 Adjustable Watering Patterns. Thumb Control Design, Comfortable Ergonomic Grip, Garden Hose Nozzle for Watering Plants & Lawns/Fun showers/Cleaning
short_description: 10 WATERING OPTIONS: Choose between a light mist, a heavy jet, and a wide range between. With this garden sprayer you can water your plants, wash your car, spray your dog, or enjoy a fun shower.
EASY GRIP: Designed with an easy grip and on/off thumb control, this water hose nozzle lets you spray without exerting pressure on a handle.
RUBBERIZED HANDLES: Thick rubber coating ensures a comfortable, nonslip grip in addition to protection from hot or cold water-flow temperatures.
LEAKPROOF NOZZLE: The garden hose sprayer tightly screws onto the hose to ensure there is no leaking or dripping. 2 attachment rubber gaskets completely seal any gaps.
PERFECT FIT: The spray nozzles for garden hose adapts to any garden hose with a head diameter of ¾ inch.

name: Eden 96806 Heavy Duty Metal Fireman Hose Nozzle, Water Nozzle w 7 Spray Patterns, High Pressure Garden Hose Sprayer w Quick Connect Set for Watering Plants,Garden Lawn
short_description: LARGE, STEADY ON/OFF HANDLE – oversized handle adjusts between off and full water pressure; great for people with arthritis or a weaker grip; water pressure can be increased or decreased for the watering task at hand

HEAVY-DUTY, METAL CONSTRUCTION – zinc alloy inner core shaft for years of use; durable construction is built to last; great for all watering chores, watering flowers, working in the yard, and much more

7 SPRAY PATTERNS – shower, flat, jet, high jet, full, cone, and fan; TPR, soft dial ring offers protection against damage and allows effortless switching to a gentle shower, ideal for watering plants.
ERGONOMIC DESIGN WITH HONEYCOMB GRIP – honeycomb grip provides extra control in wet conditions; ergonomic design reduces hand and wrist fatigue for long watering chores

QUICK CONNECT STARTER SET WITH WATER STOP – fits standard garden hoses and watering tools for quick connection and disconnection; secure twist-and-lock mechanism prevents accidental disconnection; water stop feature allows tool changes with the water on
BONUS HOSE WASHERS – 2 extra rubber hose washers included for a leak-free seal
product_description: The Eden 7-Pattern Fireman’s Nozzle delivers versatile and reliable performance, featuring seven spray patterns, from a high-pressure stream to a gentle shower perfect for flowers or potted plants. The oversized handle smoothly adjusts water flow from off to full pressure, while the ergonomic design and honeycomb grip minimize hand fatigue and provide secure control, even when wet. Built to last, this heavy-duty nozzle resists rust, leaks, and damage. The included rubber hose washers ensure a leak-free seal, while the Quick Connect Starter Set makes attaching and detaching tools effortless. A lock feature prevents accidental disconnection, and the additional Product Adapter lets you switch between sprinklers, wands, or other tools, even with the water running. With 360-degree hose swiveling, kinks and twists are a thing of the past.

name: RESTMO Hose Nozzle with Easy Self-Lock Trigger, Heavy Duty Metal Water Hose Sprayer with 9 Spray Patterns and On/Off Valve, Ideal for Outdoor Lawn & Garden Watering, Car & Pet Washing
short_description: 【Easy Self-Lock Front Trigger】The pistol grip front trigger is easy to hold and can open and shut the valve with just a simple push and pull. This is a true one-hand-control nozzle sprayer that adds more convenience for your daily watering jobs.

【Heavy Duty Garden Hose Nozzle】The nozzle gun body is constructed with zinc-alloy material, solid & robust to resist rust, corrosion and wear. The shock resistant rubberized bezel dial can enhance durability & flexibility and withstand hard impacts & heavy force in daily drops and shocks. It is much stronger, more durable and long-lasting than plastic water nozzles.

【9 Watering Patterns】Rotate the sprayer head dial to select a water pattern from Shower, Flat, Full, Mist, Jet, Center, Cone, Angle and Vertical. Whether you need the high-pressure jet to clean your patio, the useful angle to wash your car, the gentle shower to wash your dog, or the soft mist to water your garden flowers, the 9 patterns have you all covered.

【Ergonomic Design】With the unique shape handle, this hose nozzle is designed for multiple size hands. It is 80% coated with the soft TPU rubber and non-slip grip. This non-slip rubber handle, resistant heat and cold, hassle-free to use in summer and winter. You’ll always feel comfortable and forget hand fatigue when you are watering.

【Fits All Standard Garden Hoses】Threaded with the 3/4” NH Thread, this water hose sprayer fits all standard garden hoses. It is also equipped with rubber seal gasket, perfect to attach on your garden hose and provide an extreme water-tight seal, make the nozzle leak-free and save unnecessary water.

name: VIKING Hose Nozzle, Garden Hose Nozzle with 8 Spray Patterns, Adjustable and Heavy Duty for Washing Car, Watering Plants, Washing Pets, and Home Use
short_description: One VIKING Heavy Duty High Pressure Water Hose Nozzle with extra rubber washer
Water hose sprayer nozzle fits on a standard garden hose has 8 different spray patterns and adjustable flow levels to fit your every need, from cleaning patio furniture to washing the dog
Use this hose sprayer as part of your car wash kit to clean cars and home exteriors or change to a lower pressure setting to water plants
The hose nozzle sprayer has a rubberized handle, making it easy to hold for a controlled spray at all different pressures
Convenient nozzle for hose outdoor fits a standard garden hose, perfect for any home, car cleaning or gardening

name: AUTOMAN-Garden-Hose-Nozzle, ABS Water Spray Nozzle with 7 Adjustable Watering Patterns, Slip Resistant for Watering Plants, Lawn& Garden, Washing Cars, Cleaning, Showering Pets & Outdoor Fun.
short_description: 7 ADJUSTABLE WATERING PATTERNS: Each carefully selected pattern has an unique purpose,and each spray pattern will meet all of your watering needs. To change patterns simply twist the nozzle.Turn the spray nozzle dial to choose appropriate pattern easily with a faucet on the handle.
PREMIUM MATERIAL: The spray nozzle is made of Sturdy yet Ultra Lightweight ABS+TPR. Easy to grip, slip-resistant and comfortable fit, and the ergonomic rubberized pistol grip for comfortable use.

FITS ALL STANDARD GARDEN HOSES: Suitable for all standard garden hoses with 3/4” diameter garden hose thread (GHT). Perfect for Watering Your Garden, Lawn, Grass, and Flower Beds. Great for Washing Your Car,Showering Dogs and Pets,Cleaning Your Room, Deck, Floor, Window and Outdoor Fun.

LABOR-SAVING DESIGN: AUTOMAN garden nozzle features a nice lock bar at the top of the handle that keeps the water remains on without you having to apply any pressure.Just use the lock so you don't have to keep your hand holding it the whole time.

All Our Products are Produced under Strict Quality Inspection. Your satisfaction is always our top priority. Its wide application makes it an essential item for any homeowner or gardener looking for a reliable and versatile hose nozzle.

name: Melnor 65173AMZ RelaxGrip 8 Pattern 16" Pivoting Wand Bundle, Metal, Black, Yellow
short_description: Certified for Ease of Use by the Arthritis Foundation and proven to make life easier for people who have arthritis and chronic pain
Pivoting head adjusts position of the water flow
Easy to operate thumb control requires less force to operate
8 versatile patterns meet a variety of watering needs
Backed by the Melnor Limited 2-year Warranty. We stand behind our products.
product_description: RelaxGrip® handles are designed to provide a more comfortable grip, so you can get more done without putting strain on your wrists and hands. An easy to operate thumb control eliminates the need to squeeze or lock in place. The 16” wand and pivoting head make it easy to water hanging baskets or hard to reach areas. Multiple spray patterns give you the flexibility to rinse off the car or shower the vegetable garden with just one tool.

name: Hose Nozzle 2 Pack, Full Size Pistol Grip Water Nozzle Sprayer with Threaded Front, High Pressure Nozzle, Adjustable Spray Water Flow for Watering Plants, Showering Pet, Washing Car, Cleaning
short_description: All-Metal Construction—Metal body, rust and wear resistant. IRRIGLAD's unique trademark processing technology demonstrates quality. The classic pistol-style rear control design and tie rod assembly add aesthetics and longevity.
More Than 100,000 Times Of Triggers—Unique structure, reducing frictional resistance and better sealing grease, increasing the number of repeated pulls.

Precisely Regulate Flow—The water flow pattern(mist, shower, jet) can be changed by the grip force of the handle to meet different water requirements. The triangle supports the fixed flow size.The hand doesn't have to keep exerting force.
Front and Near Thread Design—Uses the standard garden thread which is the same thread you will find on an outside faucet. Threaded front for attaching cleaning tools.
High Quality Accessories—SS304 Stem with Spider and SS304 Adjust Nut, SS304 Spring prevent rust and keep bright. SS304 Washer obstruct springs and seals for increased service life.

name: RESTMO Garden Hose Nozzle, Heavy Duty Metal Water Hose Nozzle with 7 Adjustable Spray Patterns, High Pressure Hand Sprayer with Flow Control for Watering Plants & Lawns, Washing Cars & Pets
short_description: HEAVY-DUTY GARDEN HOSE NOZZLE: Body and trigger are constructed with 100% powder-coated metal material, which is robust to resist rust, corrosion and wear. The shock resistant rubberized bezel dial can also prevent it from accidental drops and damage. It is much stronger, more durable and long-lasting than plastic water nozzles.

7 WATERING PATTERNS: Rotate the sprayer head dial to select a water pattern from Shower, Jet, Flat, Center, Cone, Full and Mist. Whether you need the high-pressure jet to clean your patio or the soft shower to water your garden, the 7 patterns have you covered.

WATER FLOW CONTROL: Flow control knob can adjust the watering pressure for each of the 7 spray patterns, which can expand your options when you need to water your garden, lawn, grass, plants and flower beds. It is also flexible when you clean the patio, wash the car, dog and pet.

ERGONOMIC DESIGN: Coated with the soft TPU and non-slip grip, this low-profile hose nozzle adds comfort and avoids hand fatigue. The pistol grip front trigger is easy to hold and can be locked anytime.

FITS ALL STANDARD GARDEN HOSES: Threaded with the 3/4” NH Thread, this water hose sprayer fits all standard garden hoses. It is also equipped with rubber gasket washers, perfect to attach on your hose and provide an extreme water-tight seal, make the nozzle leak-free and save unnecessary water.
